Plan Event FCC
Experience the Unforgettable
Abundant natural lighting, sophisticated atmospheres, and world-class hospitality are at your fingertips at The Fountains Country Club. Imagine exchanging your vows under the palm trees, enjoying a cocktail at a mahogany bar with a waterfront view, and dancing the night away under crystal chandeliers… the wedding you have always dreamed of awaits you here! Our award-winning event team is dedicated to ensuring you enjoy a wedding experience that is both blissful and extraordinary. We are passionate about providing you and your guests with a venue and culinary experience that will be talked about for years to come! From your initial wedding consultation to the last dance, we are dedicated to making every moment memorable.
Complete the form to begin planning!

Meetings and Special Events in the Houston Area
Meetings and Special Events
From meetings to mitzvahs, Indian Spring Country Club has spaces both intimate and extravagant to fit your vision. With private boardrooms and several semi-private spaces available, Indian Spring Country Club has a space for any type of event.
HTML Generator
If you are looking for a place where professionalism meet with perfection in everything this is the place. And again the food was so delicious. Thank you to the staff. -Sandra
I would highly recommend Indian Springs Country Club for your wedding or any big event as they will execute your vision!! - Jenny
